inscription:
Inscription

on mount, bottom left, in graphite: [Perino del Vaga]; on mount, in right margin, in black Conté crayon: [19]; on verso of mount, in black ink: [J.W. Rehling Quistgaard]; in graphite: [RV0]
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, October 10, 1974, no. 89, for £60, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1974-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Baptism of Christ
